Text: i have downloaded the game burnt to disk and its saying i have wrong disk in plz help
you dont need to burn to disk... just mount, install and play...

@hazelaar  You need to apply the NoCDPatch.  Mount the image, explore the contents, Extract the patch and place in the proper directory.  If you don't know how to do this, you shouldn't be trying to download cracked games.  You are gonna get yourself a virus someday.  I'm just sayin'!
